channel.title: Can host a server
channel.description:
Hello there. I'am offering free HOST that's mean you get -
1-6months free host wich stands on stable VPS from 1gp to 12gb ram.
You may ask why i'am doing it? I'am going to open my own VPS service's and i need to test how's it work with Moparscape.
Recently i'am hosting only SA:MP / Counter-Strike servers.
If you interested i have only few requests -
1. I will decline free Hosting if the server will stay with 1-5 peoples online on average so server should have atleast 10 players on avg. 2. All i want - no blame/offense if il have to fix some things and VPS turn off's for 1-24hours.
If you want your server to be hosted use this form -
[table][tr][td]1. What base is your server (Pi/delta and etc?) 2. Are you sure you want to? 3. For what period you want it (1-6months)? 4. What's your MSN?[/td][/tr][/table]
Ofcourse less hosting you want more chances you get the free hosting.
Thank you for reading.

I cant make any sense of this thread. Then again its 3am…

Il try to explain to you.

I have VPS services and currently i’am hosting only Counter-Strike and SA:MP servers.

I need to test out how’s moparscape will work and if i can host it flawlessly.

If you didn’t understand not my probs.

Maybe if you tried the English language people could understand you.

“He wants to host your rsps to test out his vps” my money says this lasts a week tops if anytime at all

BTW wrong section
[/quote]

English is my like 6th lang so nothing special my speech is bad.

Tbh i asked b4 wich one section is right?[/quote]
There is no correct section. This is not allowed on this site.

item.title: Can host a server
item.dc:creator: @redrain995 redrain995
item.description:
@redrain995 wrote:

Yes, I need a hoster. I will be able to start paying after some time, and It does not NEED to be 24/7 but if you can keep it at least 90% uptime that should work.

1.) Server is Matrix/Disturbed 667/704 (RS2HD)
2.) YES!
3.) However long I can get, I will start paying once I can, just need to get the server going.
4.) I dont have MSN, but I have skype. PM me for it.

Read full topic
